DOC.brief_summary: This primary object study test hypothesis nudge boost message increase short term gym utilization relative control condition boost message increase long-term gym utilization . Non-technical summary : College student receive one three message exercise . Their card swipe data measure gym utilization track assessment effect message .
DOC.detailed_description: Our study use survey methodology . Within survey , participant randomly assign experimental condition . After completion survey , participant ' real-world behavior assess via gym card swipe data . Within survey , experimental quantitative three group design use answer research question . Thus , independent variable three level : control message , nudge message , boost message . Our dependent variable collect gym card swipe semester . The three experimental message condition deliver within questionnaire participant complete . The control group read summary information David Pottruck Health Fitness Center . Participants nudge condition read similar summary also give prompt form implementation intention . Those Boost condition also summary information Pottruck gym also give information implantation intention effective way attain long term goal . They also give prompt form implementation intention .
